title: `deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d()` error

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Hi. I am MyungJin Kang. 
I have a problem with deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d() function. 

**I tried :** 
`deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d(config_path3d, path=['D:\\Project\\AI\\DeepLabCut\\examples\\testing-teamDLC-2021-07-10-3d\\video\\test_added_video'],start=50, end=250, trailpoints=3, videotype = "MP4")`

**and I got this :**  
```
FileNotFoundError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-11-6594811888fd> in <module>
----> 1 deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d(config_path3d, path=['D:\\Project\\AI\\DeepLabCut\\examples\\testing-teamDLC-2021-07-10-3d\\video\\test_added_video'],start=50, end=250, trailpoints=3, videotype = "MP4")

~\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_3d\plotting3D.py in create_labeled_video_3d(config, path, videofolder, start, end, trailpoints, videotype, view, xlim, ylim, zlim, draw_skeleton)
    261                     "-vb",
    262                     "20M",
--> 263                     os.path.join(output_folder, str("../" + file_name + ".mpg")),
    264                 ]
    265             )

~\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\subprocess.py in call(timeout, *popenargs, **kwargs)
    337     retcode = call(["ls", "-l"])
    338     """
--> 339     with Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs) as p:
    340         try:
    341             return p.wait(timeout=timeout)

~\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\subprocess.py in __init__(self, args, bufsize, executable, stdin, stdout, stderr, preexec_fn, close_fds, shell, cwd, env, universal_newlines, startupinfo, creationflags, restore_signals, start_new_session, pass_fds, encoding, errors, text)
    798                                 p2cread, p2cwrite,
    799                                 c2pread, c2pwrite,
--> 800                                 errread, errwrite,
    801                                 restore_signals, start_new_session)
    802         except:

~\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\subprocess.py in _execute_child(self, args, executable, preexec_fn, close_fds, pass_fds, cwd, env, startupinfo, creationflags, shell, p2cread, p2cwrite, c2pread, c2pwrite, errread, errwrite, unused_restore_signals, unused_start_new_session)
   1205                                          creationflags,
   1206                                          env,
-> 1207                                          os.fspath(cwd) if cwd is not None else None,
   1208                                          startupinfo)
   1209             finally:

FileNotFoundError: [WinError 2] The system cannot find the file specified
```

Thank you everyone for the support throughout this process. ðŸ¥‡
